overview:
“Phil Sakakihara has 25 years of leadership experience in computer networking and enterprise software companies. Most recently he was Vice President of Engineering and eDiscovery Operations for CaseCentral, the market-leader in large-scale document management solutions and electronic discovery services for full litigation services for the Fortune 5000.

Previously, Sakakihara was Senior Vice President & CTO at Fidelity National Financial, where he was responsible for all enterprise software products. He has also held senior vice president of engineering positions at a number of start-ups, such as GoRemote, a leader in global, remote dial-up internet access; VOIP â€“ Wireless & WiFi, providing services in 150 countries; Prism Solutions, an industry leader in ETL or Data Warehousing Software; and Viewstar. His work resulted in two IPOs and an M&A.

Sakakihara began his career at Hewlett Packard as an engineer, working his way to CTO and General Manager. He has degrees in Applied Mathematics and has been a full-time visiting professor at UC Davis.” (Source: Akimbo)
